title: The Cool Jazz of the Haiku: Jack Kerouac
description: 'The Cool Jazz of the Haiku: Jack Kerouac' by Reynaldo Casison  is a beautiful book expressing Jack Kerouac's influence to the haiku poetry form.  Kerouac a literary legend and founder of the beatnik writing movement of 1950s and 1960s was also innovative to the haiku poetry form.  'The Cool Jazz of the Haiku: Jack Kerouac' accentuates Kerouac's innovations to the haiku poetry form.  For haiku afcionados, Kerouac fans, writers, and readers, this is a jazzy, fun, cool read, concise and beautiful!  Enjoy 'The Cool Jazz of the Haiku: Jack Kerouac' for a cool jazzy read!
author: Reynaldo Casison
